title: Settings reset to default, still old settings in game
body:
hi, 

I have an issue while trying to reset my in game settings, I've deleted Persistedsettings as recommended in another thread. I go into a custom game and all seems good. hotkeys reset as I wanted. But when I go into a normal game it still uses the old settings & hotkeys. 

also in the options menu in the client it uses old hotkeys. The reason I want to reset this way is becuase there are keybindings I want to get rid of and this seems the only way for those. Any help appricated.

replies.body: That's pretty strange, resetting your config should default your settings but it sounds like something still blocking you from saving it to our server.  This sounds like a unique case, so hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can take a closer look and help figure out what's going on with you directly.
